{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3000804,"name":"Yohan Behaghel","username":"YoyoB5553","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/y/e47c2d/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-01-31T17:43:17.867Z","cooked":"

Hello chiefdelphi,
Our team wanted to try H-drive for this year season and this is our first time with this type of base, we wanted to know if there is a need of a drop center in the middle wheel and if anyone had ever heard about an H-Drive Base with 8 wheels like this :

image1088√ó610 108 KB

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2022-01-31T17:44:25.512Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":107,"reads":276,"readers_count":275,"score":635.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":401829,"topic_slug":"h-drive-base","display_username":"Yohan Behaghel","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/uploads/default/original/3X/c/2/c2a04a6af95ec634c3b5cfd54ed20885eace4aff.jpeg","internal":true,"reflection":false,"clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":50028,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"CAD"},"post_url":"/t/h-drive-base/401829/1","custom_user_title":"CAD","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3000805,"name":"Brian Gray","username":"Brian_Gray","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/brian_gray/{size}/9971_2.png","created_at":"2022-01-31T17:45:41.353Z","cooked":"

You don‚Äôt need/want a drop center in an H-drive.

I‚Äôve only ever seen one in the wild and it had 7 wheels. I‚Äôm not sure if there will be any negligible difference with the addition of an extra center wheel.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2022-01-31T17:48:33.598Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":268,"readers_count":267,"score":68.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":401829,"topic_slug":"h-drive-base","display_username":"Brian Gray","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":31919,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Cleverly disguised as a responsible adult"},"post_url":"/t/h-drive-base/401829/2","custom_user_title":"Cleverly disguised as a responsible adult","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3000808,"name":"Gus Michel II","username":"GeeTwo","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/geetwo/{size}/120962_2.png","created_at":"2022-01-31T17:48:41.506Z","cooked":"

Do not mount the center wheel in a fixed fashion - mount it so that you have a defined force against the carpet - this can be done with springs or pneumatics, among others. 3946 built an H drive for 2015, and we never could get the strafe working consistently until post-season when we mounted the gearbox on a hinge and pushed it into the carpet with a cylinder.

There is also no reason to have three wheels on either side - two will be fine. With omnis, ‚Äúskid‚Äù is easy so you don‚Äôt need a drop center.

What advantage do you see in having two strafe wheels?

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2022-01-31T17:48:41.506Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":262,"readers_count":261,"score":102.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":401829,"topic_slug":"h-drive-base","display_username":"Gus Michel II","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":22335,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Somebody Else ‚¨õüü´üü•üüßüü®üü©üü¶üü™‚ñí‚ñí‚¨ú "},"post_url":"/t/h-drive-base/401829/3","custom_user_title":"Somebody Else ‚¨õüü´üü•üüßüü®üü©üü¶üü™‚ñí‚ñí‚¨ú ","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3000809,"name":"Chun-che Lo","username":"Attention","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/attention/{size}/65287_2.png","created_at":"2022-01-31T17:53:32.133Z","cooked":"

Read.

Fail Harder

X019 Prototype ‚Äî JVN Blog

This off-season the Robowranglers built the latest in our' ‚ÄúX000‚Äù series of prototype robots . This year‚Äôs project was an interesting one - why is it interesting, you ask? Well for one thing‚Ä¶ because we spent almost four full months designing it. ...

Cool stuff. Might help. Especially the footnote 1 portion.

Thanks for your replies everyone, and for the two middle wheels, we tried our base and one wheel is enough we just wanted to try, it doesn‚Äôt change the mecanism.

stick with 1 center wheel, if you rotate the robot with the outside wheels the torque will be differential on the center wheel axle with the wide stance (difference on center H shaft).

(srry for the short post, busy, I can elaborate later if needed)
